response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1,350,000. This price reflects a fair assessment of the product's worth while allowing for a reasonable profit on my end. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal and hope to facilitate a transaction that meets our respective needs.", "product_price": 1350000}
